incidents.name: Errors on API Requests

incident_updates.body: API requests have been resolved, and they are operating normally at this time.
API requests are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

After further investigation, we are seeing errors for a small subset of API requests. Customers may have intermittent errors in the account administration functionality. Our engineering team is working to find a resolution. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with API timeouts. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Verify SMS Errors to T-Mobile Network

incident_updates.body: Verify SMS were degraded for 2 hours and 33 minutes between 20:26 and 10:59 Pacific Time on 11/24/2023. During this period of time customers may haven’t received Verify SMS when using T-Mobile network. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Black Friday / Cyber Monday Alert

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting traffic on US and Canada networks has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

Due to increased traffic demand on mobile communication networks, we will expect potential congestion for US carrier networks during the Black Friday and Cyber Monday period. Customers may experience intermittent SMS and MMS delivery delays. Please refer to our Black Friday / Cyber Monday FAQ page, in the Help Center on Twilio.com, for more information.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body:
Due to sustained high traffic on the US carrier networks, we are currently experiencing SMS delivery delays from Twilio toll-free numbers. Messages are queued due to capacity shortage, and customers may see delays when sending to certain US carriers.
Please find the current delivery status for the major carriers below:

AT&T (status - Operational)
T-Mobile (status - Operational)
Verizon (status - Operational)
MetroPCS (status - Operational)
US Cellular (status - Operational)
Appalachian Wireless  (status - Delayed)

We are actively working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as we have any new information to share.
